scripts.install:all: cd backend && bun install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && bun install && bun run build
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && VITE_API_BASE_URL=http://34.56.225.220:3000 npm run build
scripts.gcp:build-code: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.gcp:build-image: docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t calendar-backend ./backend && docker build --platform linux/amd64 -t calendar-frontend ./frontend
scripts.gcp:tag: docker tag calendar-backend chtisanuphongcha/calendar-backend:latest && docker tag calendar-frontend chtisanuphongcha/calendar-frontend:latest
scripts.gcp:push: docker push chtisanuphongcha/calendar-backend:latest && docker push chtisanuphongcha/calendar-frontend:latest
scripts.gcp:release: npm run gcp:build-code && npm run gcp:build-image && npm run gcp:tag && npm run gcp:push
